text: honda kiyana de hadawathin kiyana ayath innawa.

eya athishaya hampadakam- biyaganwana sulu nawinathwaya samaga aragala karana, mahajana wancha dushana saha paudgalika duk santhapa asimanthika saha athimahath wana nisa apakshabhangathwayema gilwana, samaja saththawa siyawas gananak godagasu dhanaya saha balaya namathi ghana thattuwalin wasa damunu, nayipol warak pawasa athi ‘bageta thambunu‘ samaja samanga katayuthu karayi.
melo gathiyak na.

ra wunoth lamayinwa gedara ekkaragena yannata pamini demawpiyan pirisakda nishpadana ha karmika kandayamada ekathuwu kala sahena sankhyawaki.me siyalu denagema kama bima awashyatha saha prawahanaya ape ura matha patawi thibini.pamina siti ayata ude kama labadi dharmeth mamath nuwara pare thibuna podi kadayakata giye plentiyak bi dumak adinnataya.
mama nam kiyanne oka gana katha karala wadak naha.
eya sarala katayuththak nowa athishayin bararum katayuththaki.
ee nisa mada midul lakshana dekak yodagaththa.
baya wenna oone nam baya weyan kimbaullu wage saththunta, un kisi charayak nathuwa ahuwena oone ekek marala kanawa...
obath eya anugamanaya karanna.
thawath bens rathayak da aagiya athak nathayi wruththiya samithi kiyathi.
yanadiyen bhawanawata sudusu parisaraya deshana karana lada seka.
agamathithuma kiyanawa sura saradiyel wage athi ayagen aran nathi ayata denawa kiyala.
dan meka lankawe aandolanathmakama wiwahaya wela.
mata ahuwenna ehema epa no..tiya.
maitha්ri - ranil unna nam lankawa koronawen amarikawath paradanawa..!
mokak ho kuli wadak karala kiyak hari hoyagena mama kolambaa yanawa.
me thamayi obe khelle kakkum wasara gananawakata honda karana majik diyaraya pawichchi karanna me widihata.
ape durakathanaye siyaluma daththa laba ganima dakwama eeka barapithala wiya hakayi.

adath hitha ganna oya issara welamayi drayiwin sit eke inda gaththe kiyala..”

ekama de nawatha nawatha balimata nohaki bawin eewata amatharawa thawath gunathmaka chithrapata thibena bawin ekama de penwimen walakina men adala baladharingen mama ithama wagakimen illa sitimi.palaka saman pererahandalagitha kumarasinhage abiman liya namin yuth tharuna tharuniyan udesa kerena samajiya mehewara anekuth nalu niliyan da aadarshayata ganne nam kotharam aganeda.sunil chandrasekarayagodamullakotugodasanda teli sithuwame sama charithayakma siduwimakma pudumakara manushika hangimakin yukthaya.

ada dawase janathawata aadaraya karanawa namin me karana kala waranaya ha maha sanskruthika kappaduwata dayakawimata obata asimitha nidahasak labi atha - ee nidahasa apata ape adahas pa්rakasha karanna labadi natha.

wada karana janathawata awama jiwana watupak sahathika kirima sandaha rajaya, wruththiya samithi saha wanija mandala niyojithayan athulath sewaka kwunsilayak pihituwana bawada agramathyawaraya awadharanaya kaleya.
ese sama samaja stharayakama jiwath wannan sandaha nishchitha ananyathawak laba di garu buhumanata pathkara atha.

“kiya giyath mokada, dan apita thattu dekaka geda­rak thiya­nawa ne watila inna.

moris bhani tath amarasiri piris tath thiyenne bara gambauru handawal.
anna eekayi api ohelata salli denne“ ingirisi karayo denna as uda thiyan eka parata kiwwa.
